description: This extension adds Soft and Weak references support to PHP 7 and may serve as a ground for other data structures that require advanced referencing model.
name: ref

0.4.4.releaseNotes:
This release improves PHP 7.2 compatibility support

Changelist:
 - Restore original referent obj handler when it is no longer tracked

0.4.2.releaseNotes: This is a maintenance release which drops PHP < 7.0.3 support.

summary: Soft and Weak references support in PHP
